page.title: 12DAILY LIFE (CONT.)
page.content: We have high tea at 5p.m., Ian and Neil enjoy my baking. I then help with the boys homework, iron, watch television, make the supper and go to bed at 11p.m. {Recipe - }Oatmeal Soup 2 ozs. Rolled Oats 1 large Grated Carrot 1 pint Chicken Stock Chopped Parsley 2 medium Chopped Onions 2 tablespoons Melted Butter 1 pint Milk Salt and Pepper Melt butter in pan over low heat, add onion and carrot, cook gently for 6 minutes, add oats, cook for 4 mins. stirring, add stock, little by little, season bring to boil and simmer for 25 - 30 minutes, add parsley, add milk and heat through, but do not boil.
